name: Live Dibs
tag_list: deal-of-the-day, targeted-marketing, ecommerce, group-buying, tribal, social, experiential, commercial, transactional, promotional
overview:
Live Dibs is a web portal and mobile application using geo-location technology to connect businesses and consumers in real-time.

Live Dibs Users build profiles with their consumer preferences and price points, and Live Dibs Vendors can build unlimited deals and offers – when an offer matches a User’s Live Dibs profile, the Live Dibs platform delivers that deal to a User’s web portal or mobile device for real-time purchase.

Live Dibs Users can also share deals on Facebook, Twitter, and email, and can split payment on certain offers with friends and other Live Dibs Users in real-time. Live Dibs Users can also track Vendors to receive further deals and communications from them.

Live Dibs prides itself on being a sustainable, scalable solution for the burgeoning hyperlocal deals and marketing industry: with a Vendor-friendly revenue model and the ability for Vendors and Users to create an ongoing dialog over the platform, Live Dibs is more a social marketplace than daily deal site or marketing e-blast.
